description:
How can this course help you?

During our S.O.A.R. Self‐Study Course, we'll help map out your gifts, talents, and passions to uncover your vision, mission in life.

See Yourself and Your World with Newfound Appreciation

Own the Eccentricities and Differentiators that Make You Extraordinary

Articulate Your Message with Clarity & Passion

Release Your Gifts and Lessons Learned to Transform Lives

S.O.A.R.

What are you going to get from this course?

Over 25 lessons and more than 30 questions and exercises to help map our your vision, mission and legacy

Freedom to work at your own pace with downloadable pdf files and additional resources

Over 1.5 hours of content (REQUIRES longer timeframe to complete the exercises throughout this course as you are asked to work at your own pace)

Who Will Benefit?

Anyone asking the following questions:

What is next for me?

Am I on the right career path?

What are my greatest gifts, talents and passions?

How can I bring more of “me" to the work I do?

What is my vision for my life?

How can I live out a mission that benefits others while honoring my desires for personal happiness & peace?

How and where can I find work or do something that truly inspires me and gives me a sense of meaning and purpose?

What will be my greatest legacy when I'm gone?

Course Goals:

1) Uncover your gifts, talents, hobbies and interests

2) Craft affirmation statements

3) Identify your existing beliefs to help shift your perspectives

4) Clarify your vision and mission

5) Rediscover your significance

6) Awaken to your relationship with self and others, highlight the roles you get to play in life

7) Craft your desired purpose and legacy

8) Make commitments and create actions steps to help manifest your vision into reality
title: Uncover Your Unique Gifts, Talents, Vision & Mission in Life
